operations.title: Manage webhooks (@todo: implement webhooks)
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can create, edit and delete webhooks

operations.title: Update own messages
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can update/delete their own messages inside this channel

operations.title: Update messages
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can update/delete messages inside this channel

operations.title: Manage reactions
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can add new reactions to a message
